Html: Is there any way to clear the navigation history or remove items from it? If I have user auth on the application I want to keep them from using the back button after they logout.
No, that's not available yet, but a great suggestion. Would you mind creating an issue for it?
Is there any solution for this?
Not yet. Requires some modifications to the navigation stack and possibly the inclusion of a NavigationService (which doesn't exist yet).
Ok. Thanks. Can you give me an example on how to remove the Back Button?
The back button can be removed only by setting a custom ModernWindow.Template
Is there any solution for this now?
